canceled_text: The lending was canceled, no options are available
loanRequestSent: The loan request has been sent, please wait for the lender to accept it or cancel it if you no longer want to borrow the book.

userHomeView.cancelText: Are you sure you want to cancel this lending request? This action is not reversible.
userHomeView.confirmReturnText: Do you happen to have the book back? If so confirm it's return so you can close the lending!
userHomeView.inProgressText: You are all set! You should make arrangements for delivering the asset to the lender if you haven't already
userHomeView.rejectLendingText: Rejecting the lending request is non-reversible. Do you want to reject the lending request?
userHomeView.verifyLendingText: Confirming the lending request means you accept to give the book the user that asked for it. Do you want to confirm the lending request?
userHomeView.pendingText: This asset has an open lending request. Do you want to confirm or reject the lending request?
userHomeView.pendingText2: This asset has an open lending request. Nonetheless you cannot confirm delivery because it's marked DELIVERED in another lending request.
userHomeView.changeReservabilityNo: This asset is currently reservable. Do you want to make it non-reservable?
userHomeView.changeReservabilityYes: This asset is currently not reservable. Do you want to make it reservable?
userHomeView.deleteAssetText: Are you sure you want to delete this asset? This action is not reversible.
userHomeView.cannotMakeItNotReservable: As long as it is reservable and has an ongoing lending, it cannot be NOT reservable
userHomeView.changeVisibilityTextPublic: This asset is private. Would you like to make this asset public?
userHomeView.changeVisibilityTextPrivate: This asset is public. Would you like to make this asset private?

userBookDetails.cannotMakeItPublic: As long as it is not reservable and has an ongoing lending, it cannot be public
